cost_functions.name: n_dt_ice
cost_functions.definition: total number of ice-dynamical time steps

cost_functions.name: min_visc_its_per_dt
cost_functions.definition: smallest number of visc its per time step

cost_functions.name: max_visc_its_per_dt
cost_functions.definition: largest number of visc its per time step

cost_functions.name: mean_visc_its_per_dt
cost_functions.definition: mean number of visc its per time step

cost_functions.name: n_Axb_its
cost_functions.definition: total number of linear solver iterations

cost_functions.name: min_Axb_its_per_visc_it
cost_functions.definition: smallest number of linear solver its per visc it

cost_functions.name: max_Axb_its_per_visc_it
cost_functions.definition: largest number of linear solver its per visc it

cost_functions.name: mean_Axb_its_per_visc_it
cost_functions.definition: mean number of linear solver its per visc it
